boards.title: Team Purpose
notes: Empower researchers through technology, training, and support.

boards.title: Team Guiding Principals
notes: Values we share, about how we work with each other
Be Inquisitive: We  support each other to question the 'norm'
Be Brave: We support each other to think differently and speak up about what is challenging us
Be Innovative: be safe to fail, and innovate in the face of barriers
Be Friendly: We nurture the team's social and personal connections, rejoicing diversity and maintaining our humor
Be collaborative: We will work together as a team, share knowledge, and support each other to achieve our goals.
Be Empowered: Self starters who are inspired to do something when you can,  solving the problem, not the symptoms
Invest in ourselves: Continue to learn, grow and share, and solve a problem if you can when you find it
Be accountable:  We will take responsibility for our work, be transparent in our communication, and strive to deliver on our commitments.
Continuous Improvement: We will seek out opportunities to learn and improve our skills, processes, and tools
Quality: We will prioritise delivering quality services, leveraging the best of Technology, People and Processes
Provide fair, efficient and equitable access to Research resources

boards.title: Team Agreement
notes: Be excellent to each other
It's ok not to know
Actively share what you learn
Listen with intent and learn through questions
All questions are welcome and all ideas are worth sharing
Always assume good intent from co-workers and customers
There are different ways to achieve a results
Learn from mistakes made
Trust each other
Celebrate the small wins

boards.title: Team Objectvies
notes: Software Development
Support & Engagement
Platform (DevOps / SysOps)
Delivery
Bioinformatics
